arts.sum: Aston Villa begin their Europa League campaign on Thursday night in desperate need of a positive result to ignite their season. A dismal start to their Premier League campaign has left the club in crisis, with just one goal scored and no wins to their name. arts.ttl: Pre-Match Analysis: Aston Villa vs Bologna
arts.sum: Defensively, Bologna will look to remain compact and frustrate Villa, potentially drawing the game into a cagey affair. Villa are expected to take the initiative, controlling possession through a midfield likely anchored by John McGinn .

arts.ttl: Aston Villa v Bologna: predicted line-up, team news and match preview
arts.sum: If ever a team needed a break from domestic football and a chance to put things right on the Europa League stage, Aston Villa is it.
